column5: Hey Gang, As many of you know Yamaha has a new crazy outboard the Yamaha VMAX SHO. This thing is awesome and It has been living on the back of my boat for the last three weeks. It has been a challenge hiding it everytime I have been on the water. It's the only one in Canada but we can show the world now. Check out this video Yamaha put together of the first time I got to drive it  http://www.youtube.com/user/YamahaCanada#p/a/u/1/zFCljQsAu40  Dave Mercer
Looks great, feel free to upgrade my yamaha!
OMG.... What a monster for performance.. I'll take one too.....  Tiz
If I had one of those on my boat, the hull would never get wet. I might though.
Do they have it in a 8hp  lol
Dave , this is a game changer for sure, when you picking me up for a ride? would like to be in a bass boat without smelling all that amsoil i burn
thats why they call em "2 smokes"...I know it sure makes a difference on a snowmobile
Nice vid.. It's going to be decades before I can afford an engine like that.. lol..
another thought, you know times are changing when the big first look at an international companies new product, comes from you tube
What a gorgeous piece of machinery....wow
cool video little too much power for my 15 foot boat
